name: You're in Charge
description:
You're in Charge is a spooky li'l point-and-click where you find yourself both the baby-sitter and the baby sat. 

Instead of studying at home you've been locked up in a run-down house, trapped behind bars and with little hope of a timely rescue. Your only company in this dingy environment is a small child---who, technically speaking, is one of your captors himself. Still, with this boy's help, can you escape your prison before it's too late?

This game features:

  • Three unique endings
  • Original artwork
  • Original soundtrack
  • Short playtime

Unfortunately, it also features

  • Potentially upsetting scenes or sounds (it is technically a horror game)

Developer here! You're in Charge is a game I made to practice working with Visionaire Studio, and is not likely to receive future updates outside of bug or aesthetic fixes.

Also as a note, I'm not completely sure I packaged the mac build right, so if there's any problems with playing that one, let me know and I will try to fix it.
